full_summary:
Government of Canada
Tender Opportunities
**F1640-230574 - Laboratory and Scientific Equipment Contract**

**Project Title:** Datalogger Contract
**Solicitation Number:** WS4274150661
**Publication Date:** November 10, 2023

**Closing Date:** November 28, 2023, 2:00 PM EST

This advance contract award notice is issued under Trade Agreement / Accord de commerce: Canadian Free Trade Agreement (CFTA).

**Opportunity Details:**

* The contract is for the supply, delivery, and installation of datalogger equipment to the Department of Fisheries and Oceans (DFO) at various locations in British Columbia.
* The procurement category is Goods and Services.
* The procurement method is Advance Contract Award Notice.
* The selection criteria is Lowest Price.
* The tendering process is Limited Tendering (Due to Additional Deliveries).

**Bidder Information:**

* Bidders may obtain the solicitation document from the Contracting Authority through the Public Services and Procurement Canada (PSPC) website.
* Bidders must submit their bids in electronic format to PSPC’s electroniclocked bid box (https://bidpage.pwgsc.gc.ca/) by 2:00 pm EST on the closing date.
* The contract is expected to commence on an unspecified date and is expected to run for an unspecified period.

**Contact Information:**

* Christine Cress, Contracting Authority
* Phone: Not Available
* Email: [christine.cress@tpsgc-pwgsc.gc.ca](mailto:christine.cress@tpsgc-pwgsc.gc.ca)

**Notice URL:** [https://discovery.ariba.com/rfx/17942859?extsite=MTc5NDI4NTlfQU4wMTQ4NDA1MDk5Mg==](https://discovery.ariba.com/rfx/17942859?extsite=MTc5NDI4NTlfQU4wMTQ4NDA1MDk5Mg==)

**Attachments:** None

Please note that the tender has expired as of November 10, 2023. All inquiries must be directed to the Contracting Authority after the closing date.   [1](#_ftn1)
